page.title: 20SOURCES/CREDITS:Gringley
page.content: 'The Beacon' (Parish Magazine): 'Children's Page'from Nov.1983,Jan, Feb,Mar,April,May,Aug,Sept.1984 for text pages 18-19.Residents of Gringley who supplied valuable information during interviews.Staff,Parents,& Pupils at St.Peter's Primary School who supplied,collected, collated & processed a vast amount of relevant data(text pp3-7,12-14,16-17)& played host to numerous groups of Ordsall pupils during June & July.Two groups of first year pupils at Ordsall Hall School who spent c.6 Hrs per week (English & Humanities lessons) over a period of 7 weeks working on the Project;Ms Y.Croston,Mr G.B.Hardy,Mr C.G.Sisum (Humanities Faculty);Mrs K.J.Millns,Mrs C.R.Withall (English Faculty);Mrs P.E.Whitmore (Headteacher of Gringley School).
